VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Health Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Health Sciences is arc {Arts}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Social Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Social Sciences is arc {Arts}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Health Sciences} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Health Sciences to Arts in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Health Sciences to Business in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Social Sciences and Arts in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Social Sciences and Arts is {57}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Health Sciences and Arts in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Health Sciences and Arts is {39}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Arts?
SC.A: The total flow output from Arts is {204}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Arts?
SC.A: The total flow input by Arts is {240}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 316? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {422} from {Business} to {Health Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 54? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {51} from {Arts} to {Social Sciences}, a flow of {44} from {Arts} to {Health Sciences}, a flow of {39} from {Health Sciences} to {Arts}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 62 and 75? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {67} from {Health Sciences} to {Social Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Arts to Business or from Health Sciences to Business?
NC.A: The flow from {Health Sciences} to {Business} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Business to Health Sciences, from Social Sciences to Arts, or from Arts to Business?
NC.A: The flow from {Business} to {Health Sciences} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Business}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Business} and {Health Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Business, Arc Health Sciences, Arc Arts, Arc Social Sciences}.
